text: Era bagambe nti, Omuntu yenna ow’omu zadde lyabwe mu mirembe gyonna eginajjanga giddiriragana bw’ataabenga mulongoofu, naye n’asemberera ebiweebwayo ebyawuliddwa ebitukuvu, abaana ba Isirayiri bye banaabanga baleese eri Mukama Katonda, omuntu oyo anaagoberwanga ddala n’ava mu maaso gange. Nze Mukama Katonda.
